card_text: Destroy as many cards in each player's Pendulum Zones as possible, then apply these effects, in sequence, depending on the number of cards destroyed by this effect.$N●1+: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.$N●2+: You can add 1 Pendulum Monster from your Main Deck to your hand.$N●3+: You can banish 1 card on the field.$N●4: You can add 1 "Wavering Eyes" from your Deck to your hand.
